# Test that GoImportsLocalPrefix works for existing imports

# Verify that new imports get correctly placed
exec go mod download
vim ex 'e main.go'
errlogmatch -wait 30s 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/main.go
vim ex 'GOVIMGoImports'
vim ex 'noautocmd w'
cmp main.go main.go.golden

# Disabled pending resolution to https://github.com/golang/go/issues/34103
# errlogmatch -count=0 'LogMessage callback: &protocol\.LogMessageParams\{Type:(1|2), Message:".*'

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

require (
	example.com/blah v1.0.0
	rubbish.com/useless v1.0.0
)
-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	"example.com/blah"
	"rubbish.com/useless"
)

func main() {
	fmt.Println(blah.Name, useless.Name)
}
-- main.go.golden --
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	"example.com/blah"

	"rubbish.com/useless"
)

func main() {
	fmt.Println(blah.Name, useless.Name)
}
